attributes.action: stop the censoring of petitions on here for party political reasons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
rejecting petitions because they are not liked by the government or a particular political party and using reasons like party political material to avoid publishing said petitions is avoiding genuine issues the people of the united kingdom have.

Often there is a wider issue when things are rejected for Party political material reasons it is not acceptable to reject a petition on such a issue simply because the government does not like the issue.

 This reason is used to avoid a petition because there may be a slight connection to a political party however almost any issue can be connected with a political party and petitions backing the government would no doubt be accepted 

This censorship is avoiding many issues and needs to be stopped

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
